an10.29:4.1: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, kāsikosalā, yāvatā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vijitaṃ, rājā tattha pasenadi kosalo aggamakkhāyati.
an10.29:4.2: Raññopi kho, bhikkhave, pasenadissa kosalassa attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:4.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:4.4: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (1)
an10.29:5.1: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, candimasūriyā pariharanti disā bhanti virocamānā, tāva sahassadhā loko.
an10.29:5.2: Tasmiṃ sahassadhā loke sahassaṃ candānaṃ sahassaṃ sūriyānaṃ sahassaṃ sinerupabbatarājānaṃ sahassaṃ jambudīpānaṃ sahassaṃ aparagoyānānaṃ sahassaṃ uttarakurūnaṃ sahassaṃ pubbavidehānaṃ cattāri mahāsamuddasahassāni cattāri mahārājasahassāni sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahassaṃ yāmānaṃ sahassaṃ tusitānaṃ sahassaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ sahassaṃ paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ sahassaṃ brahmalokānaṃ.
an10.29:5.3: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sahassī lokadhātu, mahābrahmā tattha aggamakkhāyati.
an10.29:5.4: Mahābrahmunopi kho, bhikkhave, attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:5.5: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:5.6: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (2)
an10.29:6.1: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ ayaṃ loko saṃvaṭṭati.
an10.29:6.2: Saṃvaṭṭamāne, bhikkhave, loke yebhuyyena sattā ābhassarasaṃvattanikā bhavanti.
an10.29:6.3: Te tattha honti manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṃpabhā antalikkhecarā subhaṭṭhāyino ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
an10.29:6.4: Saṃvaṭṭamāne, bhikkhave, loke ābhassarā devā aggamakkhāyanti.
an10.29:6.5: Ābhassarānampi kho, bhikkhave, devānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:6.6: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:6.7: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (3)
an10.29:7.1: * Dasayimāni, bhikkhave, kasiṇāyatanāni.
an10.29:7.3: Pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇaṃ;
an10.29:7.12: viññāṇakasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇaṃ.
an10.29:8.1: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇāyatanānaṃ yadidaṃ viññāṇakasiṇaṃ eko sañjānāti uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇaṃ.
an10.29:8.3: Evaṃsaññīnampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:8.4: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:8.5: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (4)
an10.29:9.1: * Aṭṭhimāni, bhikkhave, abhibhāyatanāni.
an10.29:9.3: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni;
an10.29:10.1: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni;
an10.29:11.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni;
an10.29:12.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni;
an10.29:13.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni.
an10.29:13.2: Seyyathāpi nāma umāpupphaṃ nīlaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ nīlanidassanaṃ nīlanibhāsaṃ, seyyathā vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ nīlaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ nīlanidassanaṃ nīlanibhāsaṃ;
an10.29:13.3: evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni;
an10.29:14.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni.
an10.29:14.2: Seyyathāpi nāma kaṇikārapupphaṃ pītaṃ pītavaṇṇaṃ pītanidassanaṃ pītanibhāsaṃ, seyyathā vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ pītaṃ pītavaṇṇaṃ pītanidassanaṃ pītanibhāsaṃ;
an10.29:14.3: evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni;
an10.29:15.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni.
an10.29:15.2: Seyyathāpi nāma bandhujīvakapupphaṃ lohitakaṃ lohitakavaṇṇaṃ lohitakanidassanaṃ lohitakanibhāsaṃ, seyyathā vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ lohitakaṃ lohitakavaṇṇaṃ lohitakanidassanaṃ lohitakanibhāsaṃ;
an10.29:15.3: evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni;
an10.29:16.1: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni.
an10.29:16.2: Seyyathāpi nāma osadhitārakā odātā odātavaṇṇā odātanidassanā odātanibhāsā, seyyathā vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ odātaṃ odātavaṇṇaṃ odātanidassanaṃ odātanibhāsaṃ;
an10.29:16.3: evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni;
an10.29:17.1: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ yadidaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni;
an10.29:17.4: Evaṃsaññīnampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:17.5: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:17.6: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (5)
an10.29:18.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā—
an10.29:19.1: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ yadidaṃ sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an10.29:19.3: Evaṃpaṭipannānampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:19.4: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:19.5: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (6)
an10.29:20.3: Parittameko sañjānāti, mahaggatameko sañjānāti, appamāṇameko sañjānāti, ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanameko sañjānāti—
an10.29:21.1: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ catunnaṃ saññānaṃ yadidaṃ ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanameko sañjānāti.
an10.29:21.3: Evaṃsaññīnampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:21.4: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:21.5: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (7)
an10.29:22.1: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, bāhirakānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ yadidaṃ ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, na bhavissāmi, na me bhavissatī’ti.
an10.29:22.3: ‘yā cāyaṃ bhave appaṭikulyatā, sā cassa na bhavissati;
an10.29:22.4: yā cāyaṃ bhavanirodhe pāṭikulyatā, sā cassa na bhavissatī’ti.
an10.29:22.6: Evaṃdiṭṭhīnampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:22.7: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:22.8: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (8)
an10.29:23.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā paramatthavisuddhiṃ paññāpenti.
an10.29:23.2: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, paramatthavisuddhiṃ paññapentānaṃ yadidaṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an10.29:23.3: Te tadabhiññāya tassa sacchikiriyāya dhammaṃ desenti.
an10.29:23.5: Evaṃvādīnampi kho, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ attheva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo.
an10.29:23.6: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:23.7: Tasmiṃ nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hīnasmiṃ. (9)
an10.29:24.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ paññāpenti.
an10.29:24.2: Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ paññapentānaṃ yadidaṃ channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādā vimokkho.
an10.29:24.3: Evaṃvādiṃ kho maṃ, bhikkhave, evamakkhāyiṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhanti:
an10.29:24.4: ‘samaṇo gotamo na kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, na vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpetī’ti.
an10.29:24.5: Kāmānañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, pariññaṃ paññāpemi, rūpānañca pariññaṃ paññāpemi, vedanānañca pariññaṃ paññāpemi, diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto anupādā parinibbānaṃ paññāpemī”ti. (10)
